tool_description: Verifies that all structural elements meet required safety factors according to building codes, checking against failure modes including bending, shear, buckling, and bearing.

analysis_type.description: Type of structural analysis (beam, column, foundation, connection)

actual_stress.description: Actual stress in element in MPa or psi

allowable_stress.description: Allowable stress per code in MPa or psi

building_code.description: Applicable building code (AISC, ACI318, IBC, Eurocode, CSA)

error_messages: Unknown analysis type: Use one of [beam, column, foundation, connection]
Invalid stress values: Both actual_stress and allowable_stress must be positive
Unsupported building code: Use one of [AISC, ACI318, IBC, Eurocode, CSA]
Stress comparison error: allowable_stress should be greater than zero for meaningful comparison
usage: Provide analysis_type, actual_stress, allowable_stress, and building_code. The tool compares actual versus allowable stresses and determines code compliance.

code_compliant.description: Whether design meets building code requirements

utilization_ratio.description: Ratio of actual to allowable stress
